name: Scooter Rush - Uphill Climbing Bike Race
name_original: Scooter Rush - Uphill Climbing Bike Race
description:
Play Free Games on:
http://www.myarcadegames.net

Help the Hipster with his beautifully trimmed beard to survive!

Test your reflexes with this ultimate scooter challenge. How far can you go?

Stay on the platform as long as you can, avoid the red blocks by going back and forth using the arrows on the screen. Do your best to balance the scooter when jumping off hills, so you don't make a headspin and hit your head.


Features:
-Insanely simple and addictive
-Endless gameplay
-Improve your reaction and reflexes
-High scores with gamecenter support
